channel.title: Personal on Koakuma's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Koakuma's Notes

item.title: A New Start
item.description: Update: I finally decided to join the fediverse! It’s been fun so far! Hi, Koakuma here~ Okay so… this blog started out as a publicly viewable version of my computer- related notes and experiances, especially with less common platforms like PowerPC. As time goes on, I feel like I should write about something better than just random, unorganized stuff. But there’s one problem: I don’t know what to write about yet.
